Title: Requires the state board of real property tax services to hold not less than five meetings annually; authorizes the board to hold certain meetings remotely
Summary: Requires the state board of real property tax services to hold not less than five meetings annually; authorizes the board to hold certain meetings remotely.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to requiring the state board of real property tax services to hold not less than five meetings annually and authorizing the board to hold certain meetings remotely
